comments.body:
~Index service is specific to sandbox. please keep everything related to it in sandbox. basically `participant-state-index` is mostly not needed anymore, because there is now only a single daml-on-x stack.~
index service is specific to the participant server. given that `participant-state-index` is a dependency of `participant-state-metrics`, this now pulls in the `index` api into kvutils, which we don't want to happen.
It only pulls it into _kvutils/app_, which depends on _sandbox_ anyway, but I agree, we should move it to _com.digitalasset.platform.apiserver_ in _sandbox_.
